tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE capital_gains (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    investment_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    sale_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    capital_gain DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE capital_gains (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   investor_name VARCHAR(255),
   investment_amount DECIMAL,
   investment_date DATE,
   sale_amount DECIMAL,
   sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investment_returns (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   investor_name VARCHAR(255),
   investment_amount DECIMAL,
   investment_date DATE,
   return_amount DECIMAL,
   return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE capital_gains (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    investment_date DATE,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_currency VARCHAR,
    gain_amount DECIMAL,
    gain_currency VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    amount DECIMAL,
    currency VARCHAR,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE capital_gains (
    user_id UUID,
    investment_id UUID,
    currency TEXT,
    amount NUMERIC,
    purchase_date DATE,
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    investment_type TEXT,
    amount NUMERIC,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id UUID,
    transaction_type TEXT,
    amount NUMERIC,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE capital_gains (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cryptocurrency VARCHAR(50),
  investment_amount DECIMAL,
  sale_amount DECIMAL,
  date_of_sale DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  investor_id INT,
  cryptocurrency VARCHAR(50),
  transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tax_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  investor_id INT,
  taxable_amount DECIMAL,
  tax_rate DECIMAL,
  tax_paid DECIMAL,
  report_date DATE
);
